summary: This bill mandates the Secretary of Defense to establish the Artificial General Intelligence Steering Committee. The committee, composed of various high-ranking officials within the Department of Defense, is tasked with analyzing the trajectory of AI models, assessing adversary capabilities, analyzing military applications, developing a Department strategy for adoption, and analyzing the threat landscape. A report on the committee's findings must be submitted to Congress by January 31, 2027. The bill sunsets on December 31, 2027.
